content: #project-safe-transmute is kicking off a unified crate to provide marker traits for safe transmutation. It seems reasonable to host the repo on the Secure Code WG github. We're working on that now, currently trying to transfer https://github.com/rylev/mem-markers to WG github

Repo transferred: https://github.com/rust-secure-code/mem-markers
Owners team created: https://github.com/orgs/rust-secure-code/teams/mem-markers-admins/members
